name: bake_recipe
description: Bake (execute) a recipe (a list of operations) in order to derive an outcome from the input data

name: batch_bake_recipe
description: Bake (execute) a recipe (a list of operations) in order to derive an outcome from a batch of input data

name: perform_magic_operation
description: CyberChef's magic operation is designed to automatically detect how your data is encoded and which operations can be
